name: Raining Apocalypse (ENDERCRAFT)
description:
AS A FRIST TIME PROJECT IN GAME DEV, THIS IS AN INFINITE GAME WHERE YOU HAVE TO DODGE FALLING FROZEN BALLS FOR THE LONGEST TIME. LEADERBOARDS ARE THERE FOR YOU TO TRACK YOUR PROGRESS AND SEE HOW LONG OTHER PLAYERS SURVIVED IN A 2D GAME CALLED RAINING APOCALYPSE.

- CONTROLS -

press/hold right part of the screen To move RIGHT 

press/hold left part of the screen To move LEFT

ALT+ F4 BUTTONS TO QUIT BECAUSE I WAS TO LAZY TO DO A QUIT BUTTON!!
